title: Couple With Heart Person Man Medium Light Skin Tone No Skin Tone
description: Represents romantic love between a person and a man, often signifying a strong, affectionate bond or a couple celebrating their relationship.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender embrace between two figures, with the left figure showcasing a medium-light skin tone and the right having a neutral, uncolored hue, symbolizing a universal representation of connection. A vibrant, heart-shaped glow emanates from their joined forms, rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients for a soft, inviting feel. The figures are subtly angled towards each other, their forms outlined with gentle, rounded edges that convey a sense of closeness and affection, making it ideal for expressing romantic love or deep platonic bonds in digital communication.
